panels.description: CPU Usage across the entire system
panels.title: System Utilization

panels.description: All internal Security Groups Cluster members info

matcher.options: TCP out of state drops status

panels.title: Members Info

renameByName.Value #D: TCP out of state drops status
renameByName.Value #D (lastNotNull): TCP out of state drops status

panels.description: Average CPU usage of the top members
panels.title: CPU Busy by members

targets.expr: system_memory_usage{environment=~"$d_environment", sp_security_group_id=~"$d_group_id", host_name=~"$d_hostname", state="used"} / ignoring (state) (system_memory_limit{environment=~"$d_environment", sp_security_group_id=~"$d_group_id", host_name=~"$d_hostname"}) * 100

system_filesystem_usage{environment=~"$d_environment", sp_security_group_id=~"$d_group_id", host_name=~"$d_hostname", state="used", mountpoint="/"} / ignoring (state) (system_filesystem_limit{environment=~"$d_environment", sp_security_group_id=~"$d_group_id", host_name=~"$d_hostname", mountpoint="/"}) * 100

system_paging_usage{environment=~"$d_environment", sp_security_group_id=~"$d_group_id", host_name=~"$d_hostname", state="used"} / ignoring (state) (system_paging_limit{environment=~"$d_environment", sp_security_group_id=~"$d_group_id", host_name=~"$d_hostname"}) * 100

sum by (environment, sp_security_group_id, host_name) (system_network_interface_io_receive_rate{environment=~"$d_environment", sp_security_group_id=~"$d_group_id", host_name=~"$d_hostname", interface!~"TOTAL|lo"})

sum by (environment, sp_security_group_id, host_name) (system_network_interface_io_transmit_rate{environment=~"$d_environment", sp_security_group_id=~"$d_group_id", host_name=~"$d_hostname", interface!~"TOTAL|lo"})

sum by (environment, sp_security_group_id, host_name) (system_network_dropped_receive{environment=~"$d_environment", sp_security_group_id=~"$d_group_id", host_name=~"$d_hostname", interface!~"TOTAL|lo"})

sum by (environment, sp_security_group_id, host_name) (system_network_dropped_transmit{environment=~"$d_environment", sp_security_group_id=~"$d_group_id", host_name=~"$d_hostname", interface!~"TOTAL|lo"})
sum by (environment, sp_security_group_id, host_name) (system_traffic_connections{environment=~"$d_environment", sp_security_group_id=~"$d_group_id", host_name=~"$d_hostname"})
